attributes.action: Introduce a pet keeping licence costing £50 per household per year. Using gained money to police the licence.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: All pet owning households should have to pay, for example, £50 per year for a licence to have pets. The money gained could be used to fund a department policing animal cruelty. Animal cruelty is a growing problem and we in this country rely on individuals reporting incidents to a charity who if able then need police and vets to prove cruelty is taking place. The main obstacle to this is the governments lack of interest except when issues are in the news

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
